description.lang: Oomi Mote is an intelligent Z-Wave remote controller that mounted on a wall. It has 4 touch buttons that you can easily control the Z-Wave devices in your home network via touching, long pressing or sliding the button areas. Its surface has a RGB LED to indicate the button actions also accompanied by touch beep and vibration. The Mote is also a security Z-Wave device and supports Over The Air (OTA) feature for the products firmware upgrade.
Z-Wave Plus Lifeline.When touching the Button 1 to 4, the Central Scene Notificcation command will be sent to the associated node (1) in Association group 1.
When touching the Button 1, the Basic Set command will be sent to the associated nodes in Association group 2.
When touching the Button 1, the Multilevel Switch Set command will be sent to the associated nodes in Association group 3.
When touching the Button 2, the Basic Set command will be sent to the associated nodes in Association group 4.
When touching the Button 2, the Multilevel Switch Set command will be sent to the associated nodes in Association group 5.
When touching the Button 3, the Basic Set command will be sent to the associated nodes in Association group 6.
When touching the Button 3, the Multilevel Switch Set command will be sent to the associated nodes in Association group 7.
When touching the Button 4, the Basic Set command will be sent to the associated nodes in Association group 8.
When touching the Button 4, the Multilevel Switch Set command will be sent to the associated nodes in Association group 9.
Enable/disable the touch sound.
Enable
Disable

Enable

Reset the Mote to factory default.
Reset all configuration parameters to factory default setting
Reset to factory default setting and removed from the z-wave network

Set the low battery value..
The value range is 5% to 50%.

name.lang: To configure which report will be sent when pressing the buttons.

description.lang: To set which notification would be sent to the associated devices (Group 1) when pressing the buttons.
